head.title: Search phrases in {{FileFormatUp}} using {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{ProgLang}} applications with powerful phrase search capabilities for document content.

header.title: Search for phrases in documents
header.description: Find specific phrases quickly with {{ProdFullName}}. Integrate efficient search functionality into your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful library for indexing and searching text in documents. It supports over 70 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, images, and ZIP files, enabling fast and accurate search results.

more_features.title: Discover {{EnvNameShort}} document search engine
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables phrase searches across 70+ file formats. Easily locate and manage data with advanced search capabilities.

feature_1.title: Phrase search
feature_1.content: Search for exact phrases in business documents, including PDFs, Word files, presentations, and spreadsheets. Use wildcards and other options if the exact phrase is unknown.

feature_2.title: Efficient data indexing
feature_2.content: Create and reuse search indexes to speed up document searches. Indexing structures data efficiently, making phrase searches faster.

feature_3.title: Multi-language support
feature_3.content: Search documents in over 80 languages. Supports different keyboard layouts and morphological word forms for better search accuracy.

feature_4.title: Flexible search options
feature_4.content: Customize searches with features like case sensitivity, fuzzy and homophone search, document filtering, and more.

formats.title: Phrase search in business documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports searches in 70+ document formats. Use advanced options and indexing to streamline your search process.

operations.title: Advanced features
operations.description: Utilize powerful and efficient search functionalities.

examples.comment_1: Path to store the search index

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies searching in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Use various options to refine search results in {{EnvName}} applications.
